comments.text:
+LitZena Don't believe everything you see on the internet. Most of the 
time, if it has the word "rumored" it's not true.
comments.author: NJAY8/16/08

comments.text:
+LitZena That was past. did you even watch the video above? Ellen let her 
talk through anything.. like the driving part, it was evident that ellen 
wanted to say something but she let her WIFE continue. Maybe there was a 
fight, maybe there wasn't. Look it up, send me a VIDEO of them actually 
screaming at each other. I know they fight, they argue, they disagree, they 
wouldn't be human if they didn't do these things.

Look at Portia's twitter for a second. She constantly posts pics of them 
together. The "saturday selfies" that she does, most of the time with 
Ellen, some cases with their animals. Look at portia's tweet today, they 
were relaxing together with manicures and pedicures. Just look it up. If I 
want to divorce someone that would be the last thing I would do. Ellen 
isn't a girly girl. She's her own self. If you call that, acting like a 
boy, then so be it. But it would take her like, second thoughts to go to a 
nail salon. But instead of telling her wife "No, you're not going because I 
don't want to go" she instead went with her. 

If a person is controlling in a relationship, you'd see it in one look. 
"Ellen has an image she's protecting" blah blah blah. She does. She 
practices what she preaches. At the end of every show she ends it with "be 
kind to one another" she'd be a huge hypocrite if she's locking her wife 
into their house.

Please stop quoting the media.
*EVERYTHING THEY'VE SAID TO BE "RUMORED" HAS BEEN PROVEN TO NOT BE TRUE*

Times were different with Anne. Ellen has grown more as a person. Like the 
interview she had with oprah, they were both being interviewed and I 
remember this particular statement said be ellen herself about her wife
"She makes me want to be a better person" Things have changed. Portia knows 
about being constricted. She knows it damn well. She knows about being 
trapped and I can assure you, she would have left YEARS ago if she knows 
ellen was, as you say, controlling.
comments.author: NJAY8/16/08

comments.text:
Look up Ellen DeGeneres or Portia De Rossi TODAY and you will see an 
article about the fight they had on Xmas and even naming the person's house 
they were at; this is totally endless and I have learned in life where 
there's smoke there's fire.  I remember when Johnny Carson went live on air 
ages ago to denounce The National Enquirer for implying he wasn't getting 
along with his wife and incidentally they divorced and it was one of the 
nastiest divorces ever!  You do not see that many couples constantly 
arguing in tabloids and for all the bad rap they get they almost always 
turn out to be true.  Speaking strictly for myself I have seen Ellen and 
Anne on Larry King Live being interviewed and Ellen kept cutting Anne off 
so I am not just going by Anne's book that Ellen seems controlling.  I 
realize you have another take on her and everyone is entitled to their own 
opinion; I respect yours and feel you also should respect mine as well.
comments.author: LitZena

comments.text:
+LitZena right. We have no idea what's going on behind closed doors, but as 
we've seen during the past few years, they're both very supportive of the 
other in their relationship. Ellen made E.D. on air (Ed cause of Portia's 
nickname for her), she hosted the oscars and is about to release a new show 
and book about art and design and portia has been behind her all the way, 
even going to photoshoots. There's a pic of them together, posing during a 
'break' on one of ellen's photoshoots. As for portia, she got a role on 
scandal, has been seen in various places without ellen by her side and with 
her friends. C'mon, if a partner of yours is so controlling, she wouldn't 
let you go with your friends without her... she wouldn't even let you out 
of the house if she's that crazy. 

I've read her book. Portia's recovered. But she's not insecure anymore, 
maybe a little bit but she's more confident about herself than she was back 
in the 90's. If portia was desperate to get out of a relationship where 
she's held by the neck, she can go and find another woman for herself. 
Portia's beautiful, she knows that. She knows that a lot of people would be 
interested in her. So leaving Ellen would be very easy for her.

No, if they 'supposedly' get a divorce, I wouldn't hate portia. If she's 
not happy anymore, who am I to judge, my view of one of the best couples in 
hollywood would certainly change but the way I look at them as individuals 
will not change one bit. I mean it. Honestly.

Can I ask where you get these "Reports" I want to know. I really do. If 
it's from the media, don't count on it. I've said it before. 95% of the 
time the things that are rumored are always fake. As for the 5%, those are 
the ones that ellen or portia spoke from their own mouths. It's what they 
speak of. It's what came from them. They wouldn't spread rumors about 
themselves, that's ridiculous No one in their right mind would do that..
comments.author: NJAY8/16/08

comments.text:
I never said Portia's after Ellen's money; I simply said that the reporting 
on Ellen's jealously and control are eerily similar both in the case of 
Anne and Portia.  Portia is extremely smart and absolutely gorgeous; but 
that doesn't mean she's not insecure or that she's necessarly strong; she 
wrote a book, I read it cover to cover; much like Anne before her, she had 
an extremely hard past life.  All I ever said is neither one of us know 
what goes on behind closed doors.  If they did get divorced, would you 
suddenly hate Portia?  That is what happened to Anne, everyone adored her 
with Ellen and those same people turned on her after Ellen.  You have the 
right to your opinion and me, mine.
comments.author: LitZena

comments.text:
+LitZena Who's to say that what anne said was true? What if all she's 
trying to do is to tear down ellen and put a mark on her name? It's a known 
fact that ever since she broke up with Ellen, they haven't spoken to each 
other. And, reported? by whom? If it's the media, don't count on it to be 
true. Don't you see the pattern? Everything they've reported about the 
couple to be "rumored" is never true. The "Portia is pregnant" rumor? FAKE. 
"They're having a divorce" rumor? FAKE. The "They cancelled going to an 
event cause they had a fight in the car" rumor? FAKE. All of these are 
fake. Ellen's not controlling. She calls her staff her 'Family' Anyone that 
was interviewed about working for her, that actually worked for her, said 
that she was the best boss they've had. You wouldn't say that about someone 
that had been holding you by the neck.

Portia's a smart girl, she went to law school, she taught herself to adapt 
an accent she had trouble with, she constantly reads. She's an intelligent 
human being, if Ellen was controlling her, she would've left years ago. But 
she didn't. They just celebrated their *10th* anniversary this December 1st.
And please don't speak to me about "Portia is only after Ellen's money" 
she's not. She's a successful actress and model. She earns the money that 
would sustain her for years to come. if she's only after the money, she 
wouldn't be working. She wouldn't be on Scandal. She'd be in their house 
lazying all day. But she's not. She's doing her part in the relationship 
just like her wife does.
comments.author: NJAY8/16/08

comments.text:
+NJAY8/16/08
Anne wrote a book and in it there's a chapter on the relationship with 
Ellen and how controlling Ellen was which was exactly as it's been reported 
in this relationship; I respectfully disagree with you because it all comes 
down to this: I don't know and you don't know.
comments.author: LitZena

comments.text:
+LitZena Not controlled, they both get to decide, they consider the other's 
opinion before making a certain decision. There's no dominant one, and I 
honestly don't get what you're saying about Anne... For what I know, she 
broke up with Ellen (I don't know the reason) then married a man like 6 
months later. I don't believe that Ellen is controlling, she's a 
kind-hearted person that treats everyone with equality. She's fighting for 
equal rights for all people. She treats her staff as friends and 
colleagues, not just someone that works for her, If she's like that with 
her staff, (the people she has the right to control) why would she treat 
her own *wife* differently?
comments.author: NJAY8/16/08

comments.text:

to get a green card! People forget always about that but she's an Aussie 
(Now she's an American citizen), and sure she was closeted, she was so 
afraid back then, she thought that being an open lesbian will hurt her 
career, and like she said on Oprah "If someone so adorable like Ellen lost 
her career because she came out, what chance do I have to start mine?" She 
came out in 2005 after starting dating Ellen, even if some pics of her and 
her ex girlfriend Francesca Gregorini were published in some magazines 
awhile before that, she stood silent! Till Ellen came to her life and 
helped her through! So, please people don't think the fact that she's girly 
and sexy means she's certainly straight, this has nothing to do with your 
sexuality! Stop with the stereotypes already!

captions.text:
- SO THESE ARE SOME QUESTIONS
FROM VIEWERS,
BECAUSE THEY WANT TO ASK YOU--

WELL, LAUREN O'BRIEN
FROM ATLANTA, GEORGIA,

WANTS TO KNOW
IF WE WORK OUT TOGETHER.
- WE WALK TOGETHER.
WE WALK IN SANTA BARBARA A LOT.

WE DO A LOT OF HIKING,
WHICH IS REALLY NICE,

'CAUSE WE CAN GET TO CHAT
AND WALK AND--

IT'S MUCH HARDER
TO WORK OUT TOGETHER

AND WALK AROUND
OUR NEIGHBORHOOD

'CAUSE THERE ARE TOUR BUSES
EVERYWHERE,

SO, YOU KNOW, IT'D BE KIND OF
WEIRD FOR US TO WALK--
- BUT IT'S NICE.

WE'VE STOPPED
AND TAKEN PICTURES.

AND THE TOUR BUS HAS STOPPED.
- WE HAVE.

- AND WE'VE BEEN FRIENDLY
WITH THE TOUR BUSES.

- WE HAVE, AND ACTUALLY,
THE OTHER DAY,

I WAS DRIVING HOME,
AND I COULD SEE WHERE WE LIVE.
I WAS AT THE LIGHT.

AND THERE WAS A TOUR BUS,
AND I COULD HEAR...

[mumbling]
"ELLEN DEGENERES."

SO I THOUGHT,
"I WONDER WHAT THEY'RE SAYING?"

SO I ROLLED DOWN THE WINDOW,
AND OVER THE P.A.--

THAT LOUDSPEAKER THING--
THE GUY DRIVING SAID,
"IS THAT YOU, PORTIA?"

LIKE, HE COULD SEE
STRAIGHT THROUGH THE--
[laughter]

AND I WAS LIKE,
"YEAH, IT IS."

AND HE SAID, "I WAS JUST SAYING
THAT ELLEN OWNS THAT BUILDING"--
WHICH WE DON'T.
BUT IT WAS JUST HILARIOUS.

- SO NOW THEY THINK
WE OWN THE BUILDING?

WE DON'T JUST LIVE IN IT,
WE OWN THE BUILDING?

- NOW WE OWN A BUILDING.
- WOW.
- WHICH IS GREAT.

- WE SHOULD COLLECT RENT
FROM THOSE PEOPLE.

- IT WAS REALLY EMBARRASSING
THOUGH.

- GWEN RAGLAND
FROM SPOKANE, WASHINGTON,

WANTS TO KNOW WHICH ONE OF US
IS A BETTER DRIVER.
AND I THINK WE BOTH KNOW.
- [sighs]
WELL, HERE'S THE THING.

IF YOU EVER LET ME DRIVE...
- I DO.

- I THINK THAT
YOU WOULD DISCOVER

THAT I AM ACTUALLY
THE BETTER DRIVER.

- I HAVE LET YOU.
- SHE DRIVES SO FAST.
I CAN'T EVEN TELL YOU.

- I DRIVE FAST
BUT VERY SAFELY.
- YES.
SHE'S A VERY GOOD DRIVER,

BUT NOT EVERYBODY ELSE
ON THE ROAD
IS AS GOOD AS YOU, AND--

- THAT'S WHY I'M ALWAYS
LOOKING AT OTHER PEOPLE,

TO MAKE SURE
THEY SEE THAT I'M COMING.
- SO FRIGHTENING.
[laughter]
- I DRIVE VERY, VERY SAFE.

I'M ALWAYS LOOKING
IN FRONT OF ME.
I'M CHECKING MIRRORS.

- IF YOU EVER ARE
ON THE FREEWAY AND YOU SEE--

YOU THINK YOU SEE SOMETHING
SHOOT BY YOU, IT'S HER.
- NO.

- SO FAST.
- THAT'S NOT TRUE.

IT'S JUST,
COMPARED TO HOW SLOW YOU DRIVE,
YOU THINK THAT FEELS FAST.

BE HONEST.
- I DO DRIVE VERY SLOWLY.
I DRIVE LIKE A GRANNY.

- YOU DRIVE SLOW, AND YOU CAN
ONLY DO ONE THING AT A TIME.

YOU CAN ONLY FOCUS ON DRIVING.
- [groans]

- SO THAT'S WHY--
- REALLY?

- YEAH.
- YES, IT'S TRUE.

I'M NOT A GREAT MULTITASKER.
HUSH.

- YOU KNOW WHEN
I'VE LET YOU DRIVE?

IS WHEN I'M SICK, REMEMBER?
- THAT'S TRUE.

SICK AND GRUMPY
ABOUT BEING SICK.

IT'S NOT A GOOD COMBINATION.
- WELL, NO ONE WANTS TO BE SICK.

OF COURSE YOU'RE GRUMPY.
- TERRIBLE.

LAURA SZEKELY FROM--
SEE, THESE ARE THE--

YOU KNOW HOW
I'M ALWAYS STRUGGLING?

WHERE IS THIS IN HUNGARY?
SAY THAT WORD.

- [laughs]
- SAY THAT WORD.
- UM, "MAJ-I"--

- "MAJIA"--
MAGYAREGRES, HUNGARY.
- HUNGARY.

- SHE WANTS TO KNOW
HOW YOU'RE ENJOYING TWITTER.

- OH, I LOVE TWITTER.
- YOU JUST JOINED TWITTER.

- YEAH, LIKE, THREE WEEKS AGO,
I JOINED TWITTER,

AND THE FIRST WEEK, I JUST HAD
MY HEAD IN MY PHONE.

LIKE, I COULDN'T DO ANYTHING
OTHER THAN--BEYOND TWITTER.

I ACTUALLY REFER TO IT
AS THE WEEK I LOST TO TWITTER.
IT WAS THE FIRST WEEK.

BUT SO I'M CALMING DOWN
A LITTLE BIT NOW,

BUT THE FIRST COUPLE OF DAYS
WERE SO EXCITING

BECAUSE I GOT SOME FOLLOWERS,
LIKE, STRAIGHT OFF THE BAT,
WHICH WAS GREAT.

AND REMEMBER WHEN I TOLD YOU
THAT FIRST WEEKEND--

I SAID, "BABY,
I'VE GOT 32,000 FOLLOWERS."
YOU KNOW WHAT YOU SAID TO ME?

DO YOU REMEMBER?
- I THINK I DO.

- YEAH, YOU SAID,
"OH, THAT'S GREAT, HONEY.
I HAVE 32 MILLION."
[laughter]
- GUESS HOW MANY I HAVE NOW?

- 33 MILLION.
- OH.

- YEAH.
BUT YOU'VE GONE UP TOO.
- WELL, I HAVE 70 NOW.

- NOW YOU HAVE 70...THOUSAND.
- MAYBE .1.

- THOUSAND.
- SO THAT'S GOOD.
PEOPLE SHOULD FOLLOW PORTIA,

BECAUSE SHE'S FUNNY AND CLEVER,
AND YOU...

- AND I TWEET OUT PHOTOS OF HER
WHEN SHE'S NOT LOOKING.

- YOU'RE CONSTANTLY
TAKING PICTURES OF ME.

I TURN AROUND, AND I'M LIKE,
"WHAT ARE YOU DOING?"

AND YOU'RE TWEETING OUT
PICTURES OF MY BACK.
[laughter]

- IT'S TRUE.
- ALL RIGHT.

- CHECK MY LAST TWEET.
IT'S HER BACK.

- WE'RE GONNA--OH, DID YOU TAKE
ANOTHER ONE OF MY BACK?

- NO, NO, JUST THE ONE.
- OKAY.

ALL RIGHT,
SO WE'RE GONNA TAKE A BREAK.
AND THE LAST QUESTION IS JUST--

SAMANTHA FROM HIGHLAND,
NEW YORK,

SAID,
"ARE YOU ENJOYING 'SCANDAL'?"

ISN'T--YOU'RE LOVING "SCANDAL."
- LOVING "SCANDAL."

- CAN I JUST SAY--
'CAUSE PEOPLE GET REALLY INTO

THESE CHARACTERS,
AND SHE'S THE SWEETEST,

NICEST PERSON
THAT YOU'LL EVER, EVER MEET.
DON'T GET MAD AT HER,

'CAUSE IT TURNS OUT
SHE'S GONNA BE EVIL.
I THINK SHE'S GONNA BE--

LIKE, I THINK
THEY'RE MAKING YOU OUT
TO BE A REALLY BAD PERSON,

AND I DON'T WANT PEOPLE
TO CONFUSE THE CHARACTER.

YOU'RE THE SWEETEST,
MOST ADORABLE
CHARMING PERSON I KNOW.
- WELL--AW.

- AND DON'T--
DON'T HATE ON HER, BECAUSE...
[laughter]

IF I DIDN'T KNOW HER,
I'D BE SO MAD AT HER.
I THINK YOU'RE GONNA--

- OH,
YOU'RE GONNA GET MADDER TOO.

- YOU'RE GONNA RUIN EVERYTHING.
- YEAH.
[laughs]

title: Ellen Asks Portia Questions from Fans
